description.raw:
See issue #08.

Adds some hysteresis to false positives. There are two new constants in RobotPlugin:

* `cameraFalsePositiveDurationMin`: Minimum length of a false positive in seconds.
* `cameraFalsePositiveDurationMax`: Maximum length of a false positive in seconds.

Every time a false positive is created, we associate a data structure with the observed model. This structure contains:

* Time at which the false positive should expire.
* Model that replaces the real observed model (this is the false positive).

In the future, if we observe the same model again and we are in false positive period, we'll replace the observed model with the same false positive.
